Package renderer

Class RayTracerBasic

java.lang.Object
renderer.RayTracerBase
renderer.RayTracerBasic
public class RayTracerBasic
extends RayTracerBase
Class to implement rayTracing between the camera rays and the scene
Author:
Hillel, Yona
